university.description: I focused on probability theory, data analysis, and regression modeling. I work with statistical tools like R, SPSS, and Python to produce data-driven insights.

AboutMe.title: About Me
AboutMe.bio: I am a statistics undergraduate with a strong interest in data science, software development, and statistical modeling. I specialize in transforming data into actionable insights using tools like Python, R, and SPSS.
AboutMe.bio2: My technical focus extends to full-stack development, where I utilize technologies such as React, Next.js, Go, and PostgreSQL to build scalable, efficient, and user-centric web applications.

descriptions.pickin: A minimalist and fast lottery system. It offers real-time updates, a secure participation structure, and a modern interface.
descriptions.doraai: For lives that start tomorrows in health.
descriptions.ticaretIstatistik: This project highlights the Istanbul Commerce University Statistics Program, offering a concise overview of its structure, scope, and opportunities for students and stakeholders.
descriptions.codeShare: A platform where you can share your code and earn money.
